name: MOLÉCULAS PSICOATIVAS OBSERVADORAS (OBSERVER PSYCHOACTIVE MOLECULES)
description:
Assuming that everything is action and reaction, we see many molecules or connections between small spheres, many of them eyes, the visions that we can perceive, see, feel. At the center we have the face of a human being with its working mechanisms on display, small pieces, all of them important for a good functioning and connection with a fish, bringing the idea of ​​swimming or floating in a transparent book that is brought by the hand system, causing the fish to create its own storm. We have musical keys in motion bringing the creative symphony, building blocks so that we never forget the inner and pure child who falls asleep in living adults.

Year: 2018 | Technique: Black pen on paper

This artwork is from a limited edition of 10 prints
Printed in UltraChrome HD mineral pigment - Epson
297x420 mm Hahnemühle Museum Etching 350g
Wagner Possati - Brazil - São Paulo 2020

3508x4961pixels | .jpg | 96dpi | 11.9 MB

This art is part of a collection of 4 works released by Gallery Visionariom Art.
This NFT was generated as a gift from a physical work.
